Class ReleaseNotes

    Legend

    • removed functionality

    1.63.0 (03.05.2021)

    • Fixed method that did not include the field tiers PriceDraftBuilder.of(Price) and PriceDraftBuilder.of(PriceDraft). In introduced the method to set tiers directly by PriceDraftDsl.withTiers(List)
    • Fixed deadlock bug in the RetryAction.ofScheduledRetry(long, Function) in case of exception

    1.62.0 (06.04.2021)

    • Fixed type for asset in AddVariant update action
    • Address PO box gets correctly deserialized
    • Resources implement WithKey and Custom interfaces
    • Address supports custom fields
    • Support for CustomerPasswordUpdatedMessage
    • ShoppingList addLineItem supports variant selection by sku
    • Support addedAt for shopping list line items
    • Support oldSlug in product & category slug changed messages
    • Support fixed amount cart discounts
    • Support custom fields for shipping methods
    • Support SearchIndexingConfiguration for project
    • Support replicate cart in store endpoint

    1.61.0 (06.04.2021)

    • Deprecated CustomerDraft.getAnonymousCartId() and replaced with CustomerDraft.getAnonymousCart() support anonymousCart into the CustomerDraftBuilder, into the CustomerSignInCommand and in the CustomerInStoreSignInCommand
    • Support discounted field in the PriceDraft.getDiscounted()

    1.60.0 (01.03.2021)

    • Support custom fields and itemShippingDetails in OrderImport for CustomLineItems CustomLineItemImportDraft.getShippingDetails()
    • Support Error codes adding the related classes that has to be found in this page of the documentation //docs.commercetools.com/api/errors#top
    • PriceDraft.getCustomerGroup() is of type ResourceIdentifier instead of Reference

    1.58.0 (01.02.2021)

    • Support supplyChannels field to Store and add update action SetSupplyChannels, AddSupplyChannel and RemoveSupplyChannel
    • Support addedAt to LineItem in the Cart and support the relative action with the new field AddLineItem.getAddedAt()
    • Support new field in the Store Custom.getCustom() adding related updated actions SetCustomField and SetCustomType
    • Support ProductVariantAddedMessage
    • Support discount codes in CartDraft.getDiscountCodes()
    • Support key to Cart Cart.getKey(), support update action SetKey, support CartByKeyGet, support CartReplicationDraft.getKey()
    • Deprecated OrderFromCartDraft.getId() and related methods, it has been replaced with support OrderFromCartDraft.getCart(); support of method for the Cart OrderFromCartDraft#of(Cart)
    • Support resource identifier to set customer groups in SetCustomerGroup, SetCustomerGroup, SetCustomerGroup
    • Support resource identifier to set customer in SetCustomer, SetCustomer
    • Add lastModifiedAt to LineItem.getLastModifiedAt()

    1.56.0 (04.12.2020)

    • Fixed requests for resources by key with special characters by url encoding the key
    • Support customer address by key selection for AddShippingAddressId, AddBillingAddressId, RemoveBillingAddressId and RemoveShippingAddressId

    1.55.0 (23.11.2020)

    • Support customer address by key selection for updates
    • Support errors for store ProjectNotConfiguredForLanguagesError and MissingRoleOnChannelError

    1.54.0 (01.10.2020)

    • Fixed possible thread safe issue in HighPrecisionMoney usage
    • Fixed type for PriceCollectionQueryModel.channel()
    • Added new field in the CartsConfiguration CartsConfiguration.getCountryTaxRateFallbackEnabled() and the related update action changeCountryTaxRateFallbackEnabled in the Project Project#
    • Support setStore update action Order.getStore() and OrderStoreSet message OrderStoreSetMessage
    • Support distributionChannels field to Store and add update action SetDistributionChannels, AddDistributionChannel and RemoveDistributionChannel
    • Support LanguageUsedInStore error LanguageUsedInStores
    • Support AnonymousId for ShoppingLists ShoppingList.getAnonymousId()
    • Updated moneta to version 1.2
    • Changed state to ResourceIdentifier for product draft ProductDraft.getState()
    • Changed customer to ResourceIdentifier for shopping list draft ShoppingListDraft.getCustomer()

    1.53.0 (18.08.2020)

    • Added new ShippingMethodsByOrderEditGet.
    • Added new InventoryEntryCreatedMessage.
    • Added new StateByKeyGet and now update and delete can be by Key as well.

    1.52.1 (18.08.2020)

    • Fixed storeProjection and localeProjection as query parameter in Product Projection and not anymore in the priceSelection

    1.52.0 (07.07.2020)

    • Added missing ExternalTaxRateDraft.isIncludedInPrice() and added it to builder ExternalTaxRateDraftBuilder#includedInPrice()
    • Added support for additional query parameters for updates UpdateCommandDsl.withAdditionalHttpQueryParameters(NameValuePair) and search endpoints MetaModelSearchDsl.withAdditionalQueryParameter(NameValuePair).
    • Added missing ShippingMethodDraft.getLocalizedDescription() and added it to builder ShippingMethodDraftBuilder#localizedDescription()
    • Added support for additional action SetLocalizedDescription and deprecated the attribute "description" and the action "setDescription"
    • Added Store.getLanguages() and StoreDraft.getLanguages() and added update action SetLanguages
    • Added query parameters in ProductProjection PriceSelection#getLocaleProjection() and PriceSelection#getStoreProjection() and also in the PriceSelectionBuilder

1.51.0 (31.03.2020)

  • Fix formatting of GeoJSONQueryModel.withinCircle(Point, Double) with default locale not using '.' as decimal delimiter.

1.50.0 (05.03.2020)

  • Replace old default ct urls (https://api.sphere.io, https://auth.sphere.io) with new default urls (https://api.europe-west1.gcp.commercetools.com, https://auth.europe-west1.gcp.commercetools.com)

1.49.0 (16.01.2020)

  • TransactionDraftDsl is now public
  • Added new method ParcelDraft.of(TrackingData, List)
  • Added support for carts and shopping lists configuration to Project
  • CorrelationIdRequestDecorator to attach a user-defined correlation id as a value for a header with key "X-Correlation-ID" on requests going to the commercetools platform.
  • fixed GenericMessageImpl json deserialization where GenericMessageImpl.getResourceUserProvidedIdentifiers() was missing

1.48.0 (16.12.2019)

  • Added new scopes to SphereProjectScope
  • Added new customer update actions: AddStore, SetStores, RemoveStore
  • Fixed OrderMessage json deserialization bug where type field wouldn't get deserialized

1.47.0 (11.10.2019)

  • Fixed ProductImageUploadCommand.withContentType(String) ignoring provided content type
  • Added store key reference to OrderImportDraft
  • now treats headers as case insensitive
  • Added Customer.getStores() field

1.46.0 (21.08.2019)

  • Added support for ProductAddedToCategoryMessage and ProductRemovedFromCategoryMessage
  • Update actions for setting custom fields now accept empty array values

1.45.0 (02.08.2019)

  • Category, CategoryDraft, ProductLike and ProductDraft now extend the WithKey interface.

1.44.0 (07.06.2019)

  • PagedSearchResult.empty() now creates an instance with the PagedResult.getLimit() field set to 20, instead of 0

1.43.0 (03.06.2019)

  • Added ProductDiscount.getKey() and ProductDiscountDraft.getKey() ()} fields.
  • Added ProductByKeyGet, ProductUpdateCommand.ofKey(String, Long, UpdateAction), ProductDiscountDeleteCommand.ofKey(String, Long) commands
  • Added SetKey update action
  • Added CustomerToken.getExpiresAt() field
  • Added key property to CartDiscount and CartDiscountDraft

1.42.0 (24.05.2019)

  • Added support for AuthorizationHeaderAuthentication for api extensions.
  • Fixed AddLineItem staged update action structure
  • Added support for Store
  • Added support commands that allow you to access carts and orders belonging to a specific store: CartInStoreCreateCommand, CartInStoreDeleteCommand, CartInStoreUpdateCommand, CartInStoreByCustomerIdGet, CartInStoreByIdGet, CartInStoreQuery, OrderFromCartInStoreCreateCommand, OrderInStoreDeleteByIdCommand, OrderInStoreDeleteByOrderNumberCommand, OrderInStoreUpdateByIdCommand, OrderInStoreUpdateByOrderNumberCommand, OrderInStoreByIdGet, OrderInStoreByOrderNumberGet, OrderInStoreQuery
  • Added new SetShippingMethod.of(ResourceIdentifier) method
  • Added new SetSupplyChannel.of(ResourceIdentifier) method
  • Added new SetTaxCategory.of(ResourceIdentifier) method
  • Added new RemoveZone.of(ResourceIdentifier) method
  • Static 'of' methods that accept Referenceable got their names changed to 'ofReferencable' and are now deprecated. This was done for the following update actions: SetShippingMethod, SetSupplyChannel, SetTaxCategory, RemoveZone
  • Added new Type update actions : ChangeEnumValueLabel, ChangeInputHint, ChangeLocalizedEnumValueLabel

1.41.0 (10.04.2019)

  • Generated update commands no longer produce "Unchecked generics array creation for varargs" warning
  • Added timeout property to Extension and ExtensionDraft
  • Added ttlMinutes to CustomerCreatePasswordTokenCommand command
  • added the Project.getExternalOAuth() to specify external auth providers in the project level

1.40.0 (25.02.2019)

  • ZonedDateTime formatter now always include milliseconds even if they are equal to 0
  • CustomObjectByIdGet and CustomObjectByKeyGet now support expansion parameter
  • Attribute.of(String, AttributeAccess, Object) now works properly with Set of Reference
  • ChangeAttributeOrder is now deprecated
  • ChangeAttributeOrderByName added
  • Update commands 'of' methods now accept varargs
  • Added OrderEdit with create, query, update and delete commands
  • Added OrderEdit update and staged actions
  • Added OrderEditApplyCommand
  • Added new OrderEdit message types
  • Added ProductCatalogData.getCurrentUnsafe() method

1.39.0 (14.01.2019)

  • changed CartDraft.getShippingMethod(), CartShippingInfo.getTaxCategory(), {CustomLineItemDraft.getTaxCategory(), AddCustomLineItem.getTaxCategory(), SetCustomShippingMethod.getTaxCategory(), SetShippingMethod.getShippingMethod(), InventoryEntryDraft.getSupplyChannel(), SetSupplyChannel.getSupplyChannel(), OrderShippingInfo.getTaxCategory(), ProductDraft.getTaxCategory(), SetTaxCategory.getTaxCategory() return type from Reference to ResourceIdentifier
  • OrderImportDraft.getShippingInfo() is of type ShippingInfoImportDraft instead of OrderShippingInfo
  • ApiClient has a new attribute ApiClient.getDeleteAt() which marks when the project key would be deleted
  • ApiClientDraft has a new attribute ApiClientDraft.getDeleteDaysAfterCreation() which allows to specifiy the key life length
  • LineItemDraft.getSupplyChannel() and LineItemDraft.getDistributionChannel() are now of type ResourceIdentifier instead of Reference
  • PriceDraft.getChannel() is of type ResourceIdentifier instead of Reference
  • removed @Deprecated annotation from AddLineItem.of(String, int, long)
  • removed @Deprecated annotation from AddLineItem.of(ProductIdentifiable, int, long)
  • ProductVariantDraft.getPrices(), ProductVariantDraft.getAttributes() and ProductVariantDraft.getImages() are now optional
  • AddVariant action now includes assets field

1.38.0 (07.12.2018)

  • ShippingMethodDraft accepts List instead of List
  • Zone and ZoneDraft contains a key property
  • Zone is updatable, deletable by key
  • SetKey to set key for a zone
  • RemoveZone.getZone() return a ResourceIdentifier instead of Reference
  • GiftLineItemCartDiscountValue.getProduct(), GiftLineItemCartDiscountValue.getDistributionChannel(), GiftLineItemCartDiscountValue.getSupplyChannel() changed return type from Reference to ResourceIdentifier

1.37.0 (06.11.2018)

  • ChangeTaxCategory accept ResourceIdentifier as a parameter now
    • ShippingMethodDraftBuilder accept a ResourceIdentifier which is a Reference generalization
  • Added support for asynchttpclient 2.5.4
  • Now ReturnItem has two specializations LineItemReturnItem and CustomLineItemReturnItem
  • Added new field UserProvidedIdentifiers.getCustomerNumber() to reflect customer number in change messages
  • Now you can manage ApiClients programmatically, that was possible only via user interface before

1.36.0 (16.10.2018)

  • added new fields Payload.getResourceUserProvidedIdentifiers() and Message.getResourceUserProvidedIdentifiers() to reference user defined identifiers.
  • added new subscriptions for the following types CartDiscount, Channel, DiscountCode, Extension, ProductDiscount, ShoppingList, Subscription, State, TaxCategory, Type,
  • added new field Order.getRefusedGifts() in Order
  • added new message OrderCustomerGroupSetMessage
  • Now the use of invalid project key leads to client shutdown, instead of token fetching retries
  • adding new authentication scopes SphereProjectScope.MANAGE_EXTENSIONS and SphereProjectScope.MANAGE_PROJECT_SETTINGS
  • explicit sort by ProductProjectionSortSearchModel.score() in ProductProjectionSearch
  • Now you can specify the days till deletion of messages using ChangeMessagesConfiguration update action
  • two new messages ProductPriceDiscountsSetMessage and ProductPriceExternalDiscountSetMessage

1.35.0 (23.08.2018)

  • Fixed field name in cart update action SetShippingRateInput`, which was not properly working before
  • Add field modified a to Payload ResourceCreatedPayload, ResourceUpdatedPayload and ResourceDeletedPayload
  • It's now possible to query the subscriptions endpoint health via the new Subscription.getStatus()
  • Added new attributes OrderFromCartDraft.getOrderState() and OrderFromCartDraft.getState()
  • Added new update action SetValidFromAndUntil to ProductDiscount
  • AddAttributeDefinition.of(AttributeDefinition) changed parameter to AddAttributeDefinition.of(AttributeDefinitionDraft) instead
  • It's now possible to change customer in order via SetCustomerId which would result in a OrderCustomerSetMessage
  • Added new update action SetValidFromAndUntil to CartDiscount
  • Added new update action SetValidFromAndUntil to DiscountCode
  • Added new OrderDeletedMessage.
  • Added reference expansion to ShippingMethodsByCartGet.
  • Added reference expansion to ShippingMethodsByLocationGet

1.34.0 (10.07.2018)

  • Changed ProductVariantImportDraftBuilder.prices(List) argument from List to List
  • Now ChangeParent has an additional method ChangeParent.of(ResourceIdentifier) to point out the changed parent via its resource identifier.

  • Added field MessageSubscriptionPayload.getPaylaodNotIncluded() to PayloadNotIncluded to give more details when the payload is not included in a message

1.33.0 (08.06.2018)

  • while making an order with prices containing custom fields, the request used to fail, this has now been fixed.

1.32.0 (23.05.2018)

  • Add HighPrecisionMoneyImpl to enable high precision money in commercetools plateform when needed.
  • to enable permanent erasure of users data, a boolean parameter can be set now to specify this in CustomerDeleteCommand,OrderDeleteCommand, CartDeleteCommand, PaymentDeleteCommand, ShoppingListDeleteCommand, ReviewDeleteCommand, DiscountCodeDeleteCommand, CustomObjectDeleteCommand.

1.31.0 (12.04.2018)

  • add SphereJsonUtils.configureObjectMapper(ObjectMapper) to configure an existing jackson object mapper for usage with our JVM SDK
  • added Payment.getAnonymousId(), PaymentDraft.getAnonymousId() and corresponding update action SetAnonymousId

  • add support for Aws lambda based extension via AWSLambdaDestination

  • Changed return type of ProductTypeDraft.getAttributes() from List for List

1.28.0 (18.01.2018)

  • CategoryDraft.getParent() changed return type from Reference to ResourceIdentifier
  • CategoryDraftBuilder.parent(Referenceable) is now deprecated and should be replaced by the new method CategoryDraftBuilderBase.parent(ResourceIdentifier)
  • Updated Asynchronous Http Client to 2.0.38
  • Added member ParcelDraft.getItems()
  • Added DiscountCode.getValidFrom() and DiscountCode.getValidUntil()
  • Added ProductDiscount.getValidFrom() and ProductDiscount.getValidUntil()

  • Added OrderShipmentStateChangedMessage

  • Added OrderExpansionModel.state() for API consistency reasons

  • Added ParcelDraftBuilder

1.27.0 (14.12.2017)

  • Added OrderImportDraft.getTaxCalculationMode().
  • Added new OrderReturnShipmentStateChangedMessage and OrderShipmentStateChangedMessage.
  • Added OrderImportDraft.getTaxCalculationMode().
  • Added AddDelivery.getAddress().
  • Fixed bug in serialization of LocalizedEnumValue.
  • Added new update action to change the attribute constraint of a product type ChangeAttributeConstraint.
  • The following product variant update actions can now use the Asset.getKey() property to identify an asset: RemoveAsset, SetAssetTags, ChangeAssetName, SetAssetDescription, SetAssetSources, SetAssetCustomType, SetAssetCustomField.
  • The following category update actions can now use the Asset.getKey() property to identify an asset: RemoveAsset, SetAssetTags, ChangeAssetName, SetAssetDescription, SetAssetSources, SetAssetCustomType, SetAssetCustomField.
  • Added optional property position on update actions AddAsset.getPosition() and AddAsset.getPosition()
  • Added new product update action RevertStagedVariantChanges.
  • Added custom fields for cart discounts CartDiscount.getCustom(), CartDiscountDraft.getCustom() and the update action SetCustomField and SetCustomType.

1.26.0 (20.11.2017)

  • Added update action for setting the predicate of a shipping method SetPredicate.
  • Added shopping list item sku LineItemDraft.getSku().
  • Added support for new cart tax calculation mode Cart.getTaxCalculationMode(), CartDraft.getTaxCalculationMode() and the corresponding update action ChangeTaxCalculationMode.
  • Added support for creating multi buy discounts for custom line itemsMultiBuyCustomLineItemsTarget, SelectionMode.
  • Added support for getting OrderByOrderNumberGet, updating OrderUpdateCommand.ofOrderNumber(String, Long, UpdateAction) and deleting OrderDeleteCommand.ofOrderNumber(String, Long) of an order by order number.
  • Added new CustomerSignInCommand.updateProductData property to CustomerSignInCommand.

1.25.0 (19.10.2017)

  • Added support for OSGi.
  • Added support for keys in CategoryTree with CategoryTree.findByKey(String).
  • Added new shipping rate input property in Order.getShippingRateInput() and Project.getShippingRateInputType(). Added new tiered shipping rates property in ShippingRate.getTiers().
  • Added support for new parcel items property in Parcel.getItems() and ParcelMeasurements.getItems().
  • Added new product type update action RemoveEnumValues.
  • Added new product update action SetImageLabel.
  • Added getter methods for our generated draft builder classes.
  • Added new property CartDiscount.getStackingMode(), CartDiscountDraft.getStackingMode() and enum StackingMode.
  • Improved performance of QueryExecutionUtils helper class by providing the query method QueryExecutionUtils.queryAll(SphereClient, QueryDsl, Consumer) .
  • Marked ProductDraft.getMasterVariant() as nullable.

1.24.0 (29.09.2017)

  • Changed type of LineItemDraft.getCustom() to CustomFieldsDraft. This breaking change might require changes in your source code.
  • Update com.fasterxml.jackson.core plugins group from 2.6.5 to 2.8.9
  • Added missing LineItemDraftBuilderBase.custom(CustomFieldsDraft) builder method to replace now deprecated LineItemDraftBuilder.custom(CustomFields) builder method.
  • Deprecated several payment properties and update actions:
    • Payment.getAmountAuthorized(), Payment.getAmountPaid(), Payment.getAmountRefunded(), Payment.getAuthorizedUntil() and Payment.getExternalId()
    • PaymentDraft.getAmountAuthorized(), PaymentDraft.getAmountPaid(), PaymentDraft.getAmountRefunded(), PaymentDraft.getAuthorizedUntil() and PaymentDraft.getExternalId()
    • SetAmountPaid, SetAmountRefunded, SetAuthorization and SetExternalId
  • Fixed NullPointerException in TypeDraftBuilderBase.plusFieldDefinitions(FieldDefinition).
  • Added new custom fields on discount code DiscountCode.getCustom(), DiscountCodeDraft.getCustom() and corresponding update actions SetCustomType, SetCustomField
  • Added new project update actions ChangeCountries, ChangeCurrencies, ChangeLanguages, ChangeMessages, ChangeMessagesEnabled and ChangeName.
  • Added plus* methods to generated draft builder to ease working with list properties (e.g. ShoppingListDraftBuilderBase.plusLineItems(io.sphere.sdk.shoppinglists.LineItemDraft), ShoppingListDraftBuilderBase.plusLineItems(List)).
  • Added missing PaymentByKeyGet query, PaymentDeleteCommand.ofKey(String, Long) and< PaymentUpdateCommand.ofKey(String, Long, UpdateAction) commands.
  • Added support for creating multi buy discounts MultiBuyLineItemsTarget, SelectionMode.

1.23.1 (26.09.2017)

  • Fixed NullPointerException in PriceDraftBuilder.of(Price).

1.23.0 (11.09.2017)

  • Added new shipping method predicate ShippingMethod.getPredicate(), ShippingMethodDraft.getPredicate().
  • Added new shipping info method state CartShippingInfo.getShippingMethodState().
  • Introduced new CartPredicate which generalizes and deprecates the CartDiscountPredicate.
  • Added new tax mode TaxMode.EXTERNAL_AMOUNT. Added new ExternalTaxAmountDraft type, which can be used to set the external tax amount with the new update actions SetLineItemTaxAmount, SetCustomLineItemTaxAmount, SetShippingMethodTaxAmount and SetCartTotalTax.
  • Add support for getting ShippingMethodByKeyGet and updating ShippingMethodUpdateCommand.ofKey(String, Long, UpdateAction) a shipping method by key.
  • Added correlation id to oauth requests.
  • Added new SetAnonymousId cart update action.
  • Added new key property to customer Customer.getKey(), CustomerDraft.getKey() and corresponding update action SetKey. Added CustomerByKeyGet, CustomerDeleteCommand.ofKey(String, Long) and CustomerUpdateCommand.ofKey(String, Long, UpdateAction).
  • PublishScope, Publish.ofScope(PublishScope) and ProductPublishedMessage.getScope().

1.22.0 (09.08.2017)

  • A correlation id is now generated for each SphereRequest.
  • Added TaxCategory.getKey(), TaxCategoryDraft.getKey() and corresponding update action SetKey.
  • Added TaxCategoryByKeyGet and TaxCategoryDeleteCommand.ofKey(String, Long).
  • Add LineItemDraft.getSku().
  • Add ShippingMethod.getKey(), ShippingMethodDraft.getKey() and update action SetKey.
  • Added ShippingMethodDeleteCommand.ofKey(String, Long).
  • Add CartDraft.getCustomerGroup() and update action SetCustomerGroup.

1.21.0 (18.07.2017)

  • Added CustomerGroup.getKey() and CustomerGroupDraft.getKey().
  • Added ProductPublishedMessage.getRemovedImageUrls().
  • Added CustomerByEmailTokenGet to retrieve a customer by email token.
  • Added SetInputTip update action.
  • CustomerByPasswordTokenGet now uses the new endpoint.
  • Changed type of ProductDraft.getCategories() from Set<Reference<Category>> to Set<ResourceIdentifier<Category>>. This breaking change may require an update of your source code, depending on how you use the ProductDraft type. The previously returned Reference instances provided a Reference.getObj() method that is not available from ResourceIdentifier. If you relied on the Reference.getObj() method to retrieve the id or key of the referenced object, you now have to use the ResourceIdentifier.getId() and ResourceIdentifier.getKey() as exposed by the ResourceIdentifier interface.
  • Updated moneta to version 1.1
  • Changed SphereProjectScope from an enum to a class and added missing scopes. This change doesn't require changes to your source code, but requires a recompilation of all projects that depend on this class.

1.20.0 (23.06.2017)

  • Added support for Azure ServiceBus subscription destinations AzureServiceBusDestination.
  • Added support for for external line item prices LineItemDraft.getExternalPrice(), LineItemPriceMode.EXTERNAL_PRICE.
  • Added ChangeInputHint update action for product types/attribute definitions.
  • Added CustomerInvalidCurrentPassword error.
  • Fixed bug in CustomFieldsDraftBuilder.of(CustomFields), where the id was confused with the typeId.

1.19.0 (06.06.2017)

  • Added getter method SphereClient.getConfig() for accessing the SphereApiConfig.
  • Added new messages OrderPaymentStateChangedMessage, PaymentStatusInterfaceCodeSetMessage, ProductRevertedStagedChangesMessage, ProductVariantDeletedMessage and ProductDeletedMessage.
  • Added new cart discount value GiftLineItemCartDiscountValue for gift line items LineItem.getLineItemMode(), LineItemMode.GIFT_LINE_ITEM.
  • Added new key property for category Category.getKey(), CategoryDraft.getKey() and corresponding update action SetKey.
  • Added new salutation for customer Customer.getSalutation(), CustomerDraft.getSalutation() and corresponding update action ().
  • Added ProductImageUploadCommand, which previously was only available via a separate module.
  • Added missing Nullable annotations to PagedSearchResult.

1.18.0 (18.05.2017)

  • The ProductDraftBuilder class is now using a generated base class. This change doesn't require changes to your source code, but requires a recompilation of all projects that depend on this class.
  • CategoryQuery now supports sorting by Category.getOrderHint() via CategoryQueryModel.orderHint().
  • Added SetAssetSources update action for products.
  • Added new message ProductImageAddedMessage.
  • The shopping lists LineItem.getVariant() ProductVariant.getIdentifier() is now correctly initialized.
  • Removed the incorrect nullable annotation from InventoryEntryDraft.getQuantityOnStock().

1.17.0 (28.04.2017)

  • Added Payment.getKey(), PaymentDraft.getKey() and corresponding update action SetKey.
  • Added copy factor methods to draft builder classes (CategoryDraftBuilderBase.of(Category), InventoryEntryDraftBuilder.of(InventoryEntry), AssetDraftBuilderBase.of(Asset), PriceDraftBuilder.of(Price), ProductVariantDraftBuilderBase.of(ProductVariant), AttributeDraftBuilder.of(Attribute) and ProductTypeDraftBuilder.of(ProductType)) to convert from a resource to the corresponding resource draft. These changes don't require changes to your source code, but they require a recompilation of all projects that depend on these classes.
  • Added support for change subscriptions ChangeSubscription and message subscriptions MessageSubscription.

1.16.0 (12.04.2017)

  • Added ShippingRate.isMatching().
  • To enable code generation, we changed the type of ShippingRate from class to interface. This change doesn't require you to change your source code, but requires a recompilation of all projects that depend on this class.

1.15.0 (04.04.2017)

  • Added query model PriceTierQueryModel for tiered prices PriceQueryModel.tiers().
1.14.1 (30.03.2017)
  • Fix for LineItemExpansionModel.variant() so that it works correctly. This is a breaking change, but the previous version was incorrect and didn't work.

1.14.0 (28.03.2017)

  • Added PriceTier for tired prices, which are accessible via Price.getTiers() and PriceDraft.getTiers()

1.13.0 (20.03.2017)

  • OrderImportDraft now provides custom fields OrderImportDraft.getCustom()
  • LineItemImportDraft now provides custom fields LineItemImportDraft.getCustom()
  • CustomerSignInResultExpansionModel now provides expansion of the cart CustomerSignInResultExpansionModel.cart()
  • ProductVariantAvailabilityFilterSearchModel now provides filtering by isOnStockInChannels via ProductVariantAvailabilityFilterSearchModel.onStockInChannels()
  • ShoppingList and ShoppingListDraft now provide time to live attribute ShoppingList.getDeleteDaysAfterLastModification() and ShoppingListDraft.getDeleteDaysAfterLastModification()
  • Cart and CartDraft now provide time to live attribute Cart.getDeleteDaysAfterLastModification() and CartDraft.getDeleteDaysAfterLastModification()
  • ProductVariantSortSearchModel now provides sorting by sku ProductVariantSortSearchModel.sku()
  • Product update actions now support staged parameter
  • Some of our draft builder now return the more specific <Draft>Dsl types. This change doesn't require you to change your source code, but requires a recompilation of all projects that depend on these classes. The following classes changed:
    • CartDiscountDraftBuilder
    • CategoryDraftBuilder
    • CustomerGroupDraftBuilder
    • InventoryEntryDraftBuilder
    • PaymentDraftBuilder
    • ProductDiscountDraftBuilder
    • ProductVariantDraftBuilder
    • ProductTypeDraftBuilder
    • ReviewDraftBuilder
    • ShippingMethodDraftBuilder
    • TaxCategoryDraftBuilder
    • TypeDraftBuilder
    • ZoneDraftBuilder
    • ZoneDraftBuilder
  • The missing and exists filter support is now using separate interfaces. This change doesn't require you to change your source code, but requires a recompilation of all projects that depend on these classes. The following classes changed:
    • ProductAttributeFilterSearchModel
    • ProductVariantFilterSearchModel
  • ProductVariantDraftBuilderBase.of(ProductVariantDraft) now correctly copies all attributes of the given template

1.12.0 (27.02.2017)

  • Added Channel.getGeoLocation(), added support for it in ChannelQueryModel.geoLocation() and support for withinCircle predicate GeoJSONQueryModel.withinCircle(Point, Double).
  • Added shopping list resource ShoppingList with new cart update action AddShoppingList.
  • Improved recovery strategy for CustomObjectBigIntegerNumberGenerator so that it retries when the id already exists.
  • Updated org.asynchttpclient:async-http-client version of the sdk-http-ahc-2_0 module to version 2.0.28.

1.11.0 (07.02.2017)

  • Assets on categories
  • OrderImportDraft can now provide the inventoryMode to track inventory
  • Set types preserve input order, see #1294
  • ProductDraftBuilder was not preserving the key when using a ProductDraft

1.10.0 (17.01.2017)

  • Carts and orders have a new field taxRoundingMode. This rounding mode is used when calculating taxes. On Cart it is possible to set this field either at creation time or via the new update action ChangeTaxRoundingMode. When creating an Order from a Cart, the Order has the tax rounding mode of the Cart it was created from.
  • LineItem.getProductType()

1.9.0 (06.01.2017)

  • LineItem.getPriceMode()
  • Provided PriceUtils class to assist on some typical price calculations, such as gross and net conversions
  • Added CartLike.calculateSubTotalPrice() and CartLike.calculateTotalAppliedTaxes()

1.8.0 (09.12.2016)

  • CustomerQueryModel.customerGroup(), InventoryEntryQueryModel.supplyChannel() and OrderQueryModel.cart() returns a ReferenceOptionalQueryModel instead of ReferenceQueryModel to enable additional query predicates.
  • CustomerQueryModel.customerNumber()
  • links to the Java SE classes are provided in the SDK so for example for String and CompletionStage
  • Customer.getShippingAddressIds() and Customer.getBillingAddressIds() as well as the update actions AddBillingAddressId, RemoveBillingAddressId, AddShippingAddressId, RemoveShippingAddressId
  • create commands got withers for the draft objects like io.sphere.sdk.products.commands.ProductCreateCommand#withDraft(Object)
  • FilteredFacetResult.getProductCount()

1.7.0 (22.11.2016)

  • In DraftBuilder classes the build() method returns a DraftDsl class instead of its corresponding Draft interface. Similarly some methods relying on these builders have changed their return type to DraftDsl as well. The following methods are affected by this change: CartDiscountDraftBuilderBase.build(), CategoryDraftBuilderBase.build(), CustomerDraftBuilderBase.build(), InventoryEntryDraftBuilder.build(), PaymentDraftBuilder.build(), ProductDiscountDraftBuilderBase.build(), ReviewDraftBuilderBase.build(), TypeDraftBuilderBase.build(), StateDraftDsl.withRoles(io.sphere.sdk.states.StateRole), StateDraftDslBase.withRoles(Set) and StateDraftDslBase.withTransitions(Set).
  • For each resource draft builders and implementation classes are generated
  • SetDiscountedPrice
  • Address.getExternalId()
  • ProductProjectionSearch.withMarkingMatchingVariants(Boolean)

1.6.0 (21.10.2016)

  • expansion paths for discounts in line items and custom line items
  • change enum labels for product types: ChangePlainEnumValueLabel and ChangeLocalizedEnumValueLabel
  • add convenience factory methods for SetAttribute: SetAttribute.ofVariantId(java.lang.Integer, java.lang.String, java.lang.Object), SetAttribute.ofSku(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.Object)
  • PriceChangedError
  • ProductDraftBuilder.of(ResourceIdentifiable, LocalizedString, LocalizedString, List) to pass all variants as one list
  • Range constructor no longer throws InvertedBoundsException. See #1247
  • A JavaMoney initialization issue with sbt has been fixed.
  • CustomObjectBigIntegerNumberGenerator does retries only on ConcurrentModificationExceptions.

1.5.0 (14.10.2016)

  • Assets on products
  • SetLineItemTotalPrice
  • ChangeCustomLineItemQuantity and ChangeCustomLineItemMoney
  • The format of the User-Agent header changed to sth. like "commercetools-jvm-sdk/1.5.0 (AHC/2.0) Java/1.8.0_101-b13 (Linux; amd64)" from originally "commercetools JVM SDK 1.4.0". It is also possible to add a solution info, see SolutionInfo.
  • Using the default SphereClient will attempt to fetch a new token if an InvalidTokenException occurs.
  • LocalizedString.slugified() and LocalizedString.slugifiedUnique() generate a String with a max length of 256 to be valid for the commercetools platform. In addition, only allowed characters like [-_a-zA-Z0-9] will be in the output. Before that it was possible to keep for example a "+".

1.4.0 (29.09.2016)

  • State.getRoles(), AddRoles, RemoveRoles and SetRoles
  • Reference.ofResourceTypeIdAndId(String, String) and others
  • key on products and product variants: ProductLike.getKey(), ProductProjection.getKey(), ProductVariant.getKey(), ProductDeleteCommand.ofKey(String, Long), ProductUpdateCommand.ofKey(String, Long, List)
  • AddVariant.withImages(List), AddVariant.withKey(String), AddVariant.withSku(String), SetKey, SetProductVariantKey, ProductByKeyGet, ProductProjectionByKeyGet
  • OutOfStockError
  • SetShippingMethod.ofId(String) which is easier to use in a form than SetShippingMethod#of(Referenceable)
  • product update actions like RemoveImage now support to address a ProductVariant by using the SKU with RemoveImage.ofSku(String, String)
  • type update actions: ChangeEnumValueOrder, ChangeFieldDefinitionOrder and ChangeLocalizedEnumValueOrder
  • Customer.findAddressById(String)
  • a simple generator for customer and order numbers by using CustomObjects as storage: CustomObjectBigIntegerNumberGenerator
  • InventoryEntryDeletedMessage
  • custom fields for InventoryEntrys
  • MoveImageToPosition
  • PaymentTransactionStateChangedMessage.getTransactionId()
  • CartShippingInfo.getDiscountedPrice() and the ShippingInfoExpansionModel.discountedPrice() to receive the value of discounts for shipping costs and maybe expand in the Cart the CartDiscount objects.
  • Categorys Category#toString() is now using reflection so former missing fields like "metaTitle" will be included in the output.
  • JsonNodeQuery.of(String) accepts now also query parameters
  • ProductDraftBuilderBase.of(ProductDraft) is not leaky anymore, in previous versions not all fields were copied

1.0.0-RC5 (15.04.2016)

  • Add getter in Facet, Filter and FacetedSearch models to access the internal SearchModel.
  • TokensFacade.fetchCustomerPasswordFlowTokens(SphereAuthConfig, String, String) to get the access token for a customer for example to give the token to a mobile app
  • SphereAuthConfig.getScopes() to configure the scope of the access token
  • product search filters for product availability, see ProductVariantAvailabilityFilterSearchModel.isOnStock() and ProductVariantAvailabilityFilterSearchModel.availableQuantity()
  • product search sort expressions for product availability, see ProductVariantAvailabilitySortSearchModel.restockableInDays() and ProductVariantAvailabilitySortSearchModel.availableQuantity()
  • The class SetSku executes the action setSku which is staged, previous to this version it was setSKU (upper case 'K' and 'U') which updates in staged and current and has been moved to the deprecated class LegacySetSku. See also the HTTP API doc of SetSku.
  • CustomerCreateEmailTokenCommand, CustomerVerifyEmailCommand and CustomerPasswordResetCommand do not use anymore optimistic concurrency control, so it won't fail with ConcurrentModificationException and it is not necessary to load the customer version.
    Deprecated methods:
    • CustomerCreateEmailTokenCommand#getVersion()
    • CustomerPasswordResetCommand.of(io.sphere.sdk.models.Versioned, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
    • CustomerPasswordResetCommand.of(io.sphere.sdk.models.Versioned, io.sphere.sdk.customers.CustomerToken, java.lang.String)
    • CustomerPasswordResetCommand.getId()
    • CustomerPasswordResetCommand.getVersion()
    • CustomerVerifyEmailCommand.of(io.sphere.sdk.models.Versioned, java.lang.String)
    • CustomerVerifyEmailCommand.of(io.sphere.sdk.models.Versioned, io.sphere.sdk.customers.CustomerToken)
    • CustomerVerifyEmailCommand.getId()
    • CustomerVerifyEmailCommand.getVersion()

    We don't intend to delete these methods soon (later after 1.0.0).
  • ProductTypeQueryBuilder was a builder for CategoryQuery, it builds now ProductTypeQuery.
